property.name: soft_nofile
property.description: Soft limit integer value for the maximum number of file handles or open files allowed for user gpadmin. The default is 2900000. This value is set in the file /etc/security/limits.d/gpadmin.conf.

property.name: hard_nofile
property.description: Hard limit integer value for the maximum number of file handles or open files allowed for user gpadmin. The default is 2900000. This value is set in the file /etc/security/limits.d/gpadmin.conf.

property.name: soft_nproc
property.description: Soft limit integer value for the maximum number of processes allowed for user gpadmin. The default is 131072. This value is set in the file /etc/security/limits.d/gpadmin.conf

property.name: hard_nproc
property.description: Hard limit integer value for the maximum number of processes allowed for user gpadmin. The default is 131072. This value is set in the file /etc/security/limits.d/gpadmin.conf
